## Rails 4.1.0 (April 8, 2014) ##

    *Dmitry Korotkov*

    *Matias Korhonen*

Please check [4-0-stable](https://github.com/rails/rails/blob/4-0-stable/guides/CHANGELOG.md) for previous changes.
